§ 1173. Enlisted members: discharge for hardship Under regulations prescribed by the Secretary concerned, a regular enlisted member of an armed force who has dependents may be discharged for hardship. (Added Pub. L. 93–64, title I, § 102, July 9, 1973, 87 Stat. 147.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSection effective July 1, 1973, see section 206 of Pub. L. 93–64, set out as a note under section 401 of Title 37, Pay and Allowances of the Uniformed Services.
